嫢字的基本解释

嫢
guī
腰美。

嫢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》姊規切，平支，精。］
［《廣韻》求癸切，上旨，羣。］
［《廣韻》胡典切，上銑，匣。］
(1)细美貌。
(2)见“嫢盈”。

嫢字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫢； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页270第03
【廣韻】?宜切【集韻】津垂切，?音觜。盈姿貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?聚惟切，音厜。細腰也。　又【集韻】勻規切，音畦。又才規切，音䔺。義?同。　又【廣韻】求癸切【集韻】巨癸切，?音湀。小也。秦人謂細腰曰嫢。　又胡典切，音峴。義同。　又【集韻】均窺切，音規。義同。一曰婦人審諦貌。　又規恚切，音瞡。【博雅】好也。

嫢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嫢字的起名意思

暂无。

Maid
Basic explanation of words
Maid
guī
Waist beauty.
Maid
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" is cut, flat, and refined. ]
["Guangyun" Seeking Guiqie, decree, group. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Dian cut, milled, box. ]
(1) Fine and beautiful appearance.
(2) See "Mingying".
Maid
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫢; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 270 03
[Guang Yun]? Yi cut [Ji Yun] Jin Chui cut,? The sound. Graceful appearance.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ju Wei cut, sound. The waist is also thin.　[Jiyun] Evenly cut, sound border. It's just cut again, the sound is me. Righteous? Same.　[Guangyun] Seeking Guiqie [Jiyun] Juguiqie,? Yinzhen. Xiaoye. The people of Qin said that they had a thin waist and called a maid.　Hu Dianqie again, Yinxian. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] are all peeking, sound regulation. The same meaning. One said that the woman examines the truth of appearance.　Regularly cut again, sound. [Bo Ya] Good too.
